original_text: For through the anger of the Lord it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah, until he had cast them out from his presence, that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon.
korean_text: 여호와께서 예루살렘과 유다를 진노하심이 그들을 그 앞에서 쫓아내실 때까지 이르렀더라

sentences.original_text: For through the anger of the Lord
it came to pass in Jerusalem and Judah
until he had cast them out from his presence
that Zedekiah rebelled against the king of Babylon
